title: LEIF Service 2 inputs
description: This document records the inputs of the LEIF Service 2 system

properties.title: Electricity consumption of the grid
properties.description: Electricity consumption from the grid before the project

properties.title: Primary energy consumption before
properties.description: Primary energy consumption before the installation of the solar panel system during the project.

properties.title: Current inverter set power
properties.description: Current inverter set power - inverter power that was already installed before the project.

properties.title: Inverter power in project
properties.description: Inverter set power in project - in addition to the existing inverter.

properties.title: Region
properties.description: The planning region where the house is located. There are five planning regions in Latvia - Kurzeme, Latgale, Riga, Vidzeme and Zemgale planning region.
